content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF BERKELEY CITY COUNCIL
REGULAR MEETING
January 14, 2026

CALL TO ORDER
Mayor called the meeting to order at 6:31 p.m.

ROLL CALL
Councilmembers present: Kesarwani, Wengraf, Robinson, Bartlett, Harrison, Taplin, Hahn, Droste.

APPROVAL OF AGENDA
Approved without changes.

[PAGE 2]
AGENDA ITEM 1
BUDGET AMENDMENT
Staff presented a midyear adjustment to align departmental expenditures with revised revenue estimates.
Public comment focused on funding priorities for housing services and traffic safety improvements.
Action: Motion to approve budget amendment.
Vote: All Ayes.

AGENDA ITEM 2
PUBLIC SAFETY UPDATE
Informational report received and filed.

ADJOURNMENT
Meeting adjourned at 10:08 p.m.
